name: Tri Delta Transit: Paratransit
description: Door-to-door transit in eastern Contra Costa County
fullDescription: Tri Delta Transit provides ADA paratransit service for eastern Contra Costa County residents who cannot use regular bus service due to a disability.
whatTheyOffer:
- Door-to-door shared ride service
- Service in eastern Contra Costa (Antioch, Brentwood, Pittsburg, Oakley)
- Advance reservations required
- Wheelchair accessible vehicles
howToGetIt:
1. Complete the paratransit eligibility application
2. Application at trideltatransit.com
3. Assessment may be required
4. Once certified, schedule rides by phone
